skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Decreases the target's MAX HP by 30% of the damage inflicted.
skills.name: Necrotic Bolt
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%

skills.desc: Places a 50% [Increase ATK] buff on this Champion for 2 turns, then attacks all enemies. Has a 50% chance of placing a 30% [Decrease SPD] debuff for 2 turns.
skills.name: Death's Majesty
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +10%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +15%

skills.desc: Fills this Champion's Turn Meter by 25% and instantly activates the Death's Majesty Skill whenever this Champion or an ally receives a [Freeze] debuff.
skills.name: Lethal Winter [P]

skills.desc: Instantly removes any [Freeze] debuffs on this Champion and replaces them with a 30% [Increase C. RATE] buff, a 30% [Increase C. DMG] buff, and a 15% [Strengthen] buff whenever an enemy places a [Freeze] debuff on this Champion.
skills.name: Veins of Ice [P]
